creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: triptych: long procession of people walking around a curved pathway, away from a complex of buildings with thatched roofs surrounded by a fence; trees in background, flat land in middle ground; trees at R; mounted together on thick paper
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: right sheet LRC: 昇斎一景筆 {Shōsai Ikkei hitsu}
title: Crowds Paying their Respects at the Shrine where the Emperor's Enthronement was Celebrated
